msItemStruct.note: The fifteen fragments are mounted in two frames, fragments (1)-(6) in one, fragments (7)-(15) in the other. Related fragments may be among P.CtYBR inv. 3482

supportDesc.support: (1) 123 x 95 mm, (A) 10 lines, right margin, (B) 7 lines, left margin; (2) 75 x 68 mm, (A) 5 lines, top right margin, (B) 6 lines, top left margins; (3) 56 x 57 mm, (A) 7 lines, right margin, (B) 5 lines, left margin; (4) 63 x 77 mm, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 8 lines, no margins; (5) 67 x 56 mm, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 10 lines, no margins; (6) 73 x 48 mm, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 9 lines, no margins; (7) 81 x 72 mm, (A) 6 lines, top (?) left margins, (B) 6 lines, right margin; (8) 50 x 75 mm, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins; (9) 90 x 28 mm, (A) 6 lines, right margin, (B) blank; (10) 67 x 37 mm, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 2 lines, bottom margin; (11) 61 x 37 mm, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) 8 lines, no margins; (12) 33 x 62 mm, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins; (13) 47 x 34 mm, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins; (14) 26 x 31 mm, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins; (15) 21 x 29 mm, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
